programme.title: GRAND BLUE
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It's because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! programme.title: GRAND BLUE
programme.desc: Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member.
